text:
Автор: AntiHero

ВАЖНО: если вы играли в предыдущую демо-версию, пожалуйста, сбросьте кэш приложения для обновления изображений.

Это ДЕМО-ВЕРСИЯ квеста, которая продолжает развиваться.

Версия: 0.02

answers.lua_do:
function lua_do() g.fullscreen = 1
end

function lua_do()
tip_map_set = "company"
num_map_set = 3
num_map_in_set = 2
base_of_map()
pre_show_map()
end

function lua_do() g.disableAuthorButton = 1
end

function lua_do() g.disableAuthorButton = 0
end

function lua_do()
show_town() 
 
show_widgets() 
energy_show () 

for i = 6,6 do 
  --base_of_flat[i].lvl = 1
end

--base_of_flat[6].lvl = 1
--base_of_flat[3].lvl = 1
--base_of_flat[9].lvl = 1

--friends_window=1
if friends_window == 1 then
   show_friends_page()
end

if first_Darya == 0 then
   dialog_activ = 1
   fun_dialog_base = "story"
   fun_dialog_num = 12
   first_Darya = 1
end

if first_Darya == 1 and hero_equipment[4]==1 then
   dialog_activ = 1
   fun_dialog_base = "story"
   fun_dialog_num = 14
   first_Darya = 2
end

if first_Darya == 3 and not first_friend_income then
   first_friend_income = 0
   dialog_activ = 1
   fun_dialog_base = "story"
   fun_dialog_num = 21
end

if dialog_activ == 1 then
   show_text(fun_dialog_base, fun_dialog_num) 
end

show_widgets()
if AFK_show_ok == 1 then AFK_show() end


--if zombie_on_base == 0 then
  -- losses_base_attack()
--end
end

function lua_do() first_Darya = 3
button_map_ok = 1
end

function lua_do()
book_page = 14
story_quest = 4
end

function lua_do()
local messege_text = "" 
    for f=2,9 do 
     if base_of_flat[f].lvl > 0 then 
      messege_text = "<s>
<s>
<s>
<s>
"..messege_text..base_of_flat[f].name..": отношения ухудшились" 
     end 
    end 
    message (messege_text)

end

function lua_do()

g.noScroll = 1

hero_base_refresh() 
show_widgets()
show_map()

show_war_widgets()

if dialog_killing_map == 1 then
      dialog_activ = 1 
       
      if killing_map[2] then 
         fun_dialog_base = "story" 
         fun_dialog_num = killing_map[2]
      else
         fun_dialog_base = "system" 
         fun_dialog_num = 5
      end 
      
      killing_map = {}
      dialog_killing_map = 0
end

if dialog_activ == 1 then
   show_text(fun_dialog_base, fun_dialog_num) 
end
if show_skills_ok == 1 then
   show_skills()
end
map_event_refresh()
end

color_day = function(rect)<s>r
<s>t<s>r
<s>t<s>r
<s>tif times_of_day == 1 then <s>r
<s>t<s>trect:setFillColor(1, 1, 1) --день<s>r
<s>telseif times_of_day == 2 then <s>r
<s>t<s>t--rect:setFillColor(1,0.6,0.6)<s>r
<s>t<s>trect:setFillColor(1,0.7,0.8) --закат<s>r
<s>telseif times_of_day == 3 then <s>r
<s>t<s>trect:setFillColor(0.4, 0.8, 1) --ночь<s>r
<s>telseif times_of_day == 4 then <s>r
<s>t<s>t--rect:setFillColor(215/255, 180/255, 245/255)<s>r
<s>t<s>t--rect:setFillColor(225/255, 190/255, 255/255)<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>r
<s>t<s>t--if not COL1 then COL1 = 1 COL2 = 1 COL3 = 1 end<s>r
<s>t<s>trect:setFillColor(1,0.9,0.7) --рассвет<s>r
<s>t<s>t--rect:setFillColor(COL1,COL2,COL3)<s>r
<s>tend<s>r
<s>t<s>r
end<s>t<s>r

--Кнопка "Назад"<s>r
show_back_button = function(outgoing_page, fullscreen_ok, instant, art, event)<s>r
<s>t<s>r
<s>tif not art or art == 1 then link = "http://188.120.236.127/Coming_Darkness/base/back.png"<s>r
<s>telse link = "http://188.120.236.127/Coming_Darkness/base/back2.png" end<s>r
<s>tlocal picture_back = display.newImage(link)<s>r
<s>tpicture_back.xScale = (canvas.width*(8/48))/picture_back.width<s>r
<s>tpicture_back.yScale = picture_back.xScale<s>r
<s>tpicture_back.x = canvas.width*(43/48)<s>r
<s>tpicture_back.y = 0.54*picture_back.height*picture_back.yScale<s>r
<s>r
<s>tpicture_back:addEventListener("tap",<s>r
<s>t<s>tfunction() local delta = system.getTimer() - click_protection if delta > 0 or delta < - click_protection_time then<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>tclick_protection = system.getTimer() <plus> click_protection_time<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>tif event then event() end<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>tif fullscreen_ok == 0 then<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>tg.fullscreen = 0<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>telseif fullscreen_ok == 1 then<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>tg.fullscreen = 1<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>tend<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>tshow_skills_ok = 0<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>tif not instant or instant == 0 then<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>tshowPage({id = outgoing_page})<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>telse<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>tshowPage({id = outgoing_page, transition="instant"})<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>tend<s>r
<s>t<s>t<s>treturn true<s>r
<s>t<s>tend end)<s>r
end<s>r

if hero_gender == 1 then

elseif hero_gender == 2 then
   text= text.."Пол: женский"
else
   text= text.."Пол не выбран"
end

text= text.."<s>
"

if skills_base[1].buy == 1 then
text= text.."Институт физической культуры"
elseif skills_base[2].buy == 1 then
text= text.."Институт радиотехники"
elseif skills_base[3].buy == 1 then
text= text.."Институт медицины"
else
text= text.."Институт не выбран"
end

return text
end

function lua_do()
local hero
local hero2

hero = display.newImage("http://188.120.236.127/Coming_Darkness/heroes/my_hero21.png")
hero.yScale = (canvas.height/1.15) / hero.height 
hero.xScale = - hero.yScale 
hero.x = canvas.width - hero.contentWidth/4
hero.y = hero.contentHeight/2 

hero2 = display.newImage("http://188.120.236.127/Coming_Darkness/heroes/my_hero11.png")

hero2.yScale = (canvas.height/1.15) / hero2.height 
hero2.xScale = hero2.yScale 
hero2.x = hero2.contentWidth/4
hero2.y = hero.contentHeight/2

if hero_gender == 1 then
 hero:setFillColor(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
elseif hero_gender == 2 then
 hero2:setFillColor(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
else
 hero:setFillColor(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
 hero2:setFillColor(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
end


end
